game_description: Light Playground helps you explore your creativity through playing toys. Light Playground is an engaging and immersive experience for everyone to relax and have fun time bringing your imagination to life. - Select and move toys using virtual reality controllers - Create and Visualise your creations in Virtual Reality - Use different kinds of toys with one another to bring your imagination to life - Save your creations and reuse them again in future

review_2: Its amazing how you can select and move blocks using your controllers and visualise your hands in VR.
